title: v2.17.0 is ready
content:
Features:
  - Sprite sheet import
  - Added padding to sprite sheet export

Enhancements:
  - Panels now cannot be dragged off the top edge of the screen
  - Stepper can be tapped and enter input directly
  - Added some default showcase artwork

Fixes:
  - Artifact when resizing content
  - Attempt to fix a crash when removing frames
